job.name: TpcRS
job.command: # source ~/.tcshrc cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} # setenv NODEBUG yes # starver .DEV2 # setup gcc451 starver SL11d_embed setup gcc set file = $INPUTFILE0; echo "${file}" set logFile = ${file}B.log set f=`find . -maxdepth 1 -type f -name "*${file}*.root"` if ("$f" == "") then root4star -q -b 'TpcRS.C(100,"y2011,DbV20110820,sdt20110626.231156,TpcRS,phys_off",0,"Bichsel,'${file}'")' >& ${logFile} endif
